title: The Demon Is In The Details
description: Stella Campbell has come back to Silverton, Georgia to bury her wicked witch of an aunt. But is she strong enough to endure what's to come?Zane Weathers has been around a long time, like, two thousand years. But he's never met anyone who touches his warrior soul, like Stella.Together they must face not only personal obstacles, but obstacles straight from hell!
author: Harris Channing
